dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1963
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: On a peace pilgrimage to Rome during Vatican Council II, she describes their accommodations, a bus tour, fellow pilgrims, visits to friends, and an audience with Pope John XXIII.
